name: Pax Kniferude
description:
Pax Kniferude is a one-of-a-kind demon portrait from the Face Your Demons collection by Knotwork Industries.

Each of these demons are generated by combining hundreds of unique elements, colors, patterns and randomly generated designs created by the artist. The portraits do not represent evil, but rather are intended to ward off evil like gargoyles on a cathedral.

Collect these portraits and hang them in your home or workplace to protect you against evils and to remind you that you can overcome your personal demons no matter how many or how frightening they might be.

Pax Kniferude is particularly suited to warding off and protecting against the evils of bullying, zealotry, and uncompassion.

https://demons.johndilworth.com/#/VFpVSEFDT1REWjFOMC1mZDJkM2UtcGF4LWtuaWZlcnVkZS0w
